settings.title: Which animal are you?
settings.description: Are you curious to know which animal suits your personality the most? Answer to these 7 question to find out!

questions.text: Which sport do you would like try?
What's the most important thing for you?
With which natural element do you feel more in tune?
How do you would describe yourself using an adjective?
Who would you like to be?
What group of adjectives fits your personality better?

answers.title: Tiger
answers.description: You are a person powerful, elegant, cool, curious, brave and self-confident.

answers.title: Cat
answers.description: The animal that fist your personality better is the cat. You're playful, intelligent, loyal, adventurous, sensitive and shy.

answers.title: Wolf
answers.description: You are a real wolf. Traits that fits your soul better are intelligence, strength, independence, passion and efficiency.

answers.title: Bear
answers.description: Animal nearest to your soul is the bear. You are a person protective, sensitive, devote, ethical, attentive and social.

answers.title: Panda
answers.description: The panda is the animal with you share most characteristics. Like it you are playful, adorable, balanced, peace loving.
